Package inra.ijpb.data

Class Cursor3D

java.lang.Object
inra.ijpb.data.Cursor3D
public class Cursor3D
extends java.lang.Object
Identifies the position of a voxel in a 3D image by using 3 integer coordinates.
See Also:
Cursor2D
